document_name: Capacity Development for Sustainable Development and Management of Water
Capacity Development for Sustainable Development and Management of Water

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the technical and organizational capacities of the MOWE in sustainable development and management of Kingdom's water resources and  to develop integrated water resources strategic plans (IWRM) for sustainable development of available water resources for domestic, agricultural and industrial users.

project_descr:
CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT FOR 
SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF WATER RESOURCES IN THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA
